mapper.select: select from OM_GROUP a where guid_parents is null ;
mapper.sql: guid as guid ,group_code as groupCode ,group_name as groupName ,group_type as groupType ,group_status as groupStatus ,group_desc as groupDesc ,guid_emp_manager as guidEmpManager ,guid_org as guidOrg ,guid_parents as guidParents ,isleaf as isleaf ,sub_count as subCount ,group_level as groupLevel ,group_seq as groupSeq ,start_date as startDate ,end_date as endDate ,createtime as createtime ,lastupdate as lastupdate ,updator as updator
